An expression that specifies the string in which the search is to take place.

description: The REGEXP_SUBSTR scalar function returns one occurrence of a substring of a string that matches the regular expression pattern.
sample:
SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR('hello to you', '.o',1,1) 
   FROM sysibm.sysdummy1
